long_description: Offering featherweight performance for racing and serious training, the PowerTap G3 46mm Carbon Shimano Wheelset features a PowerTap G3 power meter hub to precisely measure your cadence and power. Wheelset features a PowerTap G3 rear hub, which measures how hard you pedal and transmits the data to an ANT+ compatible device for analysis. Please note, you will need a Joule or other ANT+ compatible device to use the PowerTap G3 Power Meter hub, ANT+ compatible device not included. PowerTap G3 hub is lightweight and stiff (thanks to wide flanges) and has field-serviceable electronics; hub offers real-time power data and is accurate to within  1.5%. Rims use high-quality carbon and a precisely cured resin system to produce light weight with exceptional strength; rims manufactured by Reynolds. Wheels are built with DT Swiss Competition spokes and internal alloy pillar-style nipples; wheels are clinchers and not tubeless compatible. Please note: G3 hub will not work with the CycleOps Cervo (Yellow CPU); you will need a CycleOps Joule or other ANT+ compatible device to pair with this hub. The PowerTap G3 46mm Carbon Shimano Wheelset includes skewers and Reynolds Cryo-Blue brake pads and rim strips.
short_description: Offering featherweight performance for racing and serious training, the PowerTap G3 46mm Carbon Shimano Wheelset features a PowerTap G3 power meter hub to precisely measure your cadence and power.
